content.en: Reconfigurable Computing Optimization: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the performance of configurable computers by using algorithms for temporal partitioning and scheduling data flow graphs. They are also investigating how hardware/software co-design can be optimized for embedded reconfigurable architectures, with the help of a nimble framework and automatic compilation. Additionally, algorithms for temporal partitioning and port reallocation are being developed to reduce reconfiguration time in partially reconfigurable systems.
content.da: Genkonfigurerbar Computeroptimering: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre ydeevnen af konfigurerbare computere ved at bruge algoritmer til tidsmæssig opdeling og planlægning af dataflow grafer. De undersøger også, hvordan hardware/software co-design kan optimeres for indlejrede genkonfigurerbare arkitekturer ved hjælp af en fleksibel ramme og automatisk kompilering. Derudover udvikles algoritmer til tidsmæssig opdeling og portomfordeling for at reducere konfigurationstiden i delvist genkonfigurerbare systemer.
